dict.string: if [[ "${suspendable}" -eq 1 ]] then tart run --capture-system-keys --suspendable "${1}" else tart run --capture-system-keys "${1}" fi
Erasing a Virtual Machine cannot be undone.

## Setup
Install [`tart`](https://github.com/cirruslabs/tart) with `brew install cirruslabs/cli/tart` and use it to install your virtual machines. You can install Apple Device Software Update Files (`.ipsw`) via the [Universal Action](https://www.alfredapp.com/help/features/universal-actions/).
![Universal Action to install IPSW](images/about/ipsw.png)
## Usage
Search installed virtual machines via the `tart` keyword. List VMs ignored from the main list with the `itart` keyword.
![Listing installed virtual machines](images/about/tart.png)
* <kbd>↩</kbd> Run virtual machine. * <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Overwrite with another. <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> again to restart the original. * <kbd>⌥</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Clone. <kbd>⌘</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> when naming to start the new one. * <kbd>⌃</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Delete. * <kbd>⇧</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Ignore or Unignore. * <kbd>fn</kbd><kbd>↩</kbd> Switch between Main and Ignored lists.
Save state snapshot when closing VM
Available when both host and guest are on macOS 14 or later.
In GBs. Applies when installing from ipsw.
Newline-separared list of virtual machines to hide in Main list. View them with the Ignored Keyword.
